title: System Design Level 3 â€” Caching & Load Balancing
concept: MCQs on cache usage and load balancers.

challenges.title: Q1: Cache Benefit
challenges.description: What is the primary benefit of using a cache?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Reduces disk space usage
b) Reduces data redundancy in database
c) Reduces latency for frequently accessed data
d) Guarantees strong consistency always

challenges.title: Q2: Load Balancer
challenges.description: A load balancer primarily helps to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Backup the database
b) Encrypt network traffic
c) Distribute incoming requests across multiple servers
d) Compress images for faster delivery
